pr_title: Prepared statement cache eviction should be done before statement pre…

timeline.message: Prepared statement cache eviction should be done before statement preparation - close #740

timeline.author: BillyYccc

replies.bodyText: indeed, I found this issue because I wanted tests to take less time on my machine :-)
replies.author: vietj

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if we could prune this and the removeEldestEntry method in this change since the capacity check is happening before inserting and controlled by us now.
timeline.author: BillyYccc

replies.bodyText: LinkedHashMap is still needed as it guarantees to find the eldest entry in the cache
replies.author: vietj
